title: [Ta'Illistim, Vaeshean Wey]
description: A round belltower, capped with a dark lapis-tiled spire, occupies the center of the courtyard.  Atop the spire, the silver and sapphire pennant of House Illistim waves slightly in the night breeze.  A monir door appears to be the only source of egress from the tower.  Near the top of the dark grey granite structure, a small window is barely visible.

A round belltower, capped with a dark lapis-tiled spire, occupies the center of the courtyard.  Atop the spire, the silver and sapphire pennant of House Illistim waves slightly in the breeze.  A monir door appears to be the only source of egress from the tower.  Near the top of the dark grey granite structure, a small window is barely visible.

A round bell tower, capped with a dark lapis-tiled spire, occupies the center of the courtyard.  Atop the spire, the silver and sapphire pennant of House Illistim waves slightly in the breeze.  A monir door appears to be the only source of egress from the tower.  Near the top of the silvery blue granite structure, a small window is barely visible.
